short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your subscriptions, renewal dates and other information in a Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Substash is the easiest way to track all your subscriptions from your Chrome browser. Say goodbye to the hassle of remembering all your subscriptions and never lose track of your recurring payments again.

Store all of your subscriptions securely in the cloud, making it simple to view your subscriptions from anywhere — not just the Chrome extension, but also our web and mobile apps (coming soon).

Upcoming features: 

• More subscription intervals (e.g. yearly)
• Organize subscriptions into custom categories
• Analytics dashboard of all your subscriptions 
• Multi-account support for personal and work accounts
• Subscription management for teams
